mutants.code:
def find_largest_square_area(pillars):
    pillar_set = set(pillars)
    max_area = 1
    for i in range(len(pillars)):
        for j in range(i + 1, len(pillars)):
            (p1x, p1y) = pillars[i]
            (p2x, p2y) = pillars[j]
            vx = p2x - p1x
            vy = p2y - p1y
            p3 = (p1x + vy, p1y - vx)
            p4 = (p2x + vy, p2y - vx)
            if p3 in pillar_set and p4 in pillar_set:
                area = vx ** 2 + vy ** 2
                max_area = max(max_area, area)
    return max_area

            (p2x, p2y) = pillars[j]
            vx = p2x - p1x
            vy = p2y - p1y
            p3 = (p1x + vy, p1y - vx)
            p4 = (p2x + vy, p2y - vx)
            if p3 in pillar_set and p4 in pillar_set:
                area = vx ** 2 + vy ** 1
                max_area = max(max_area, area)
    return max_area

def find_largest_square_area(pillars):
    pillar_set = set(pillars)
    max_area = 0
    for i in range(len(pillars)):
        for j in range(i + 1, len(pillars)):
            (p1x, p1y) = pillars[i]
            (p2x, p2y) = pillars[j]
            vx = p2x - p1x
            vy = p2y - p1y
            p3 = (p1x + vy, p1y - vx)
            p4 = (p2x + vy, p2y - vx)
            if p3 in pillar_set and p4 in pillar_set:
                area = vx ** 2 + vy ** 0
                max_area = max(max_area, area)
    return max_area

def find_largest_square_area(pillars):
    pillar_set = set(pillars)
    max_area = 0
    for i in range(len(pillars)):
        for j in range(i + 1, len(pillars)):
            (p1x, p1y) = pillars[i]
            (p2x, p2y) = pillars[j]
            vx = p2x - p1x
            vy = p2y - p1y
            p3 = (p1x + vy, p1y - vx)
            p4 = (p2x + vy, p2y - vx)
            if p3 in pillar_set and p4 in pillar_set:
                area = vx ** 2 + vy ** 1
                max_area = max(max_area, area)
    return max_area

def find_largest_square_area(pillars):
    pillar_set = set(pillars)
    max_area = 0
    for i in range(len(pillars)):
        for j in range(i + 1, len(pillars)):
            (p1x, p1y) = pillars[i]
            (p2x, p2y) = pillars[j]
            vx = p2x - p1x
            vy = p2y - p1y
            p3 = (p1x + vy, p1y - vx)
            p4 = (p2x + vy, p2y - vx)
            if p3 in pillar_set and p4 in pillar_set:
                area = vx ** 2 + vy ** -2
                max_area = max(max_area, area)
    return max_area
